name: First Winter
description: Seemingly trapped in a nightmarish reality of ever changing worlds and environments it's up to you to figure out exactly what has happened on board a stricken nuclear submarine.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 8 or 10 Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: 128 Storage: 880 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 8 or 10 Processor: 2GHz+ Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: 512MB DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 880 MB available space
